name: XRInputSourcesChangeEvent
description: The WebXR Device API interface XRInputSourcesChangeEvent is used to represent the inputsourceschange event sent to an XRSession when the set of available WebXR input controllers changes.
content:
Secure context
This feature is available only in secure contexts (HTTPS), in some or all supporting browsers.

The WebXR Device API interface XRInputSourcesChangeEvent is used to represent the inputsourceschange event sent to an XRSession when the set of available WebXR input controllers changes.
